DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine efficacy 70 % trichloroacetic acid atrophic scar varicella
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy TCA Effect Varicella Atrophic Scars
DOC.detailed_description: high concentration trichloroacetic acid peel show effective treat flatten atrophic acne scar . According lack effective low cost therapy remove relative common nuisance lesion ; We aim answer whether could achieve result 70 % TCA atrophic varicella scar .
DOC.criteria: Atrophic varicella scar face Active varicella infection Active Herpetic infection Previous history keloid formation
